is_a_fixpoint_of

pred

1. is_a_fixpoint_of [abian]

Source [abian]

definition
let x be object ;
let f be Function;
pred x is_a_fixpoint_of f means :: ABIAN:def 3
( x in dom f & x = f . x );
end;

2. is_a_fixpoint_of [abian]

Source [abian]

definition
let A be non empty set ;
let a be Element of A;
let f be Function of A,A;
:: original: is_a_fixpoint_of
redefine pred a is_a_fixpoint_of f means :: ABIAN:def 4
a = f . a;
compatibility
end;
